description: Gets information about the specified catalog item.

parameters.name: CatalogItemId
parameters.description: The ID of the catalog item.

nested_items.name: CatalogItemId
nested_items.description: The ID of the catalog item.

nested_items.name: ItemStatus
nested_items.description: The status of a catalog item.

nested_items.name: EC2Capacities
nested_items.description: Information about the EC2 capacity of an item.

nested_items.name: Family
nested_items.description: The family of the EC2 capacity.

nested_items.name: MaxSize
nested_items.description: The maximum size of the EC2 capacity.

nested_items.name: Quantity
nested_items.description: The quantity of the EC2 capacity.

nested_items.name: PowerKva
nested_items.description: Information about the power draw of an item.

nested_items.name: WeightLbs
nested_items.description: The weight of the item in pounds.

nested_items.name: SupportedUplinkGbps
nested_items.description: The uplink speed this catalog item requires for the connection to the Region.

nested_items.name: SupportedStorage
nested_items.description: The supported storage options for the catalog item.
